mapper.select: select distinct od.Suju_No, od.item_no, i.item_Name, od.Suju_Amount, po.Prod_State, od.balju_no from orders_detail od, item i, production_order po where od.Suju_No= #{suju_no} and od.item_no = i.item_no and po.suju_no = od.Suju_No
mapper.delete: delete from orders where suju_no = #{suju_no} and not exists (select * from production_order where suju_no = #{suju_no} and prod_state != '생산지시')
